actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.
Committee on Finance. Ordered favorably reported H.R. 3398 in lieu of this bill.

official_title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on odd-shaped or fancy watch crystals to the rate applicable to round watch crystals.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to reduce until June 30, 1986, the duty on odd-shaped or fancy watch crystals to the same rate as round watch crystals.

titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on odd-shaped or fancy watch crystals to the rate applicable to round watch crystals.
